flawed_nl_solution:
Matt spent on math and science 30% + 40% = 50% of the time.
This means he did homework from these two subjects for 50/100 * 150 minutes = <<50/100*150=75>>75 minutes.
So Matt spent 150 minutes - 75 minutes = <<150-75=75>>75 minutes doing homework from other subjects.
#### 75

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70, not 50. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
